channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat -- python-ecdsa
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat -- python-ecdsa

item.title: CVE-2019-14859|2024-08-05T00:26:39.127Z -- red%20hat -- python-ecdsa
item.description: A flaw was found in all python-ecdsa versions before 0.13.3, where it did not correctly verify whether signatures used DER encoding. Without this verification, a malformed signature could be accepted, making the signature malleable. Without proper verification, an attacker could use a malleable signature to create false transactions.
